name: ADEAYO OLADIPO
bio: HI, I'M ADEAYO! I'M A FULL-STACK ENGINEER WHO ALSO DEVELOPS GAMES IN MY SPARE TIME. THIS BLOG IS WHERE I SHARE MY THOUGHTS ON DEVELOPMENT, PROJECTS I'M WORKING ON, AND OTHER THINGS THAT CATCH MY INTEREST. I'M CURRENTLY PREPARING SHAPE IT UP FOR ITS STEAM RELEASE - YOU CAN TRY THE JAM VERSION BELOW TO GET A TASTE OF WHAT'S COMING. CHECK OUT MY PORTFOLIO TO SEE MORE OF MY WORK OVER THE YEARS.
